text:
@realDonaldTrump @LouDobbs IN SIX MONTHS!  If 12,000 if the over/under number for deaths from #COVID19 in six months, I’m taking the “over”. 
I suggest you start packing your things Mr. President, you’re moving on 1/20/2021.
